title: 中国对美国相关模拟芯片发起反倾销调查就集成电路领域美方措施发起反歧视调查
title\_zh: 中国对美国相关模拟芯片发起反倾销调查，就集成电路领域美方措施发起反歧视调查
source: RFI（法国国际广播电台 华语）
summary\_en: China's Ministry of Commerce announced on Sept. 13, 2025 two linked actions: an anti-dumping investigation into certain U.S.-origin analog IC chips (specifically commodity interface ICs and gate driver ICs using 40nm and above) and a separate anti-discrimination probe into U.S. measures targeting China’s integrated-circuit sector. The ministry said the anti-dumping probe covers shipments in 2024 (investigation period) and cites rising import volumes and falling import prices as harming domestic producers. Beijing framed the moves as a response to what it calls U.S. export controls and discriminatory restrictions meant to contain China’s advanced-tech development — and noted the probes come just before a new round of U.S.–China trade talks. The investigations follow official applications from domestic industry and will proceed under China’s legal procedures; outcomes could lead to countermeasures. ([商务部][1])
summary\_zh: 中国商务部于2025年9月13日宣布两项相关行动：对原产于美国的部分模拟集成电路（主要是通用接口芯片和栅极驱动芯片，40nm及以上工艺）立案反倾销调查，同时对美方在集成电路领域的相关措施发起反歧视调查。商务部称，申请资料显示2022–2024年间该类自美进口量明显上升、进口价格明显下降，已对国内产业造成损害。中方把这两项调查置于对美方出口管制和限制措施的应对框架内，并指出此举发生在新一轮中美经贸会谈之前。调查系依法立案并将按法定程序开展，调查结果可能产生对美方的后续对等措施。 ([商务部][1])
best\_quote\_zh: 中方将采取一切必要措施捍卫中国企业的正当权益。([商务部][2])
